doc.field: New York University Collection of Contemporary Composers' Websites
New York University Collection of Contemporary Composers' Websites

Daron Hagen is an American composer of art songs, song cycles, choral works, operas, symphonies, concerti, and chamber works. More recently, Hagen has directed and written opera films. The website contains are listing of his works, events, his biography, his writings and films, recordings, and photos.

Originally a staged production, 9/10: Love Before the Fall is a musical film composed and directed by Daron Hagen. The film documents the lives of four New Yorkers before the attacks on September 11th, 2001 and based on the legend of Orpheus and Eurydice. The website contains the trailer, production stills, behind the scenes images, and credits. Orson Rehearsed is a staged production and operafilm composed and directed by Daron Hagen. Orson Rehearsed is about the last days of actor and director Orson Welles. The website contains information on awards, videos of the film projections from the staged works, production stills, libretto, script, and reviews.
Robots.txt (a piece of code designed to limit crawler activity within a website) was ignored. Crawl was limited to domains and subdomains of static1.squarespace.com and daronhagen.com.
